Patch Set 19:

(1 comment)

This change is ready for review.
I don't quite understand the goal here

The goal is move the functions updateFRUProperty and addFruObjectToDbus from fru_device.cpp to fru_utils.cpp file as these are the common functions which is used for fru-device and ipmb-fru-device daemons.

While moving updateFRUProperty function to fru_utils.cpp file, this function calling lot of functions of fru_device.cpp like rescanBusses, rescanOneBus etc., from fru_utils.cpp. This move makes some undefined reference errors as those functions in fru_device and test_fru_utils.

So, fru_device.cpp file is added in test_fru_utils to avoid these CI issues and main function is moved to fru_device_main.cpp

Thanks for the explanation. It make sense that updateFRUProperty is common and can be shared between fru_device and ipmi_fru. The reason why this is not a clean move is that currently the function has some decency on i2c buses. I think the first step is to refactor the function to remove the dependency.
Can you explain what CI issue is and how does this change address CI issue?

While moving updateFRUProperty function to fru_utils.cpp file, this function calling functions of fru_device.cpp like rescanBusses, rescanOneBus etc., from fru_utils.cpp. This creates CI issues like undefined reference of functions rescanBusses, rescanOneBus. 

Also, test_fru_utils functions also called some fru_device functions. because of this move, getting undefined reference error. 

So, to resolve those issues, In meson.build, added fru_device.cpp, fru_utils.cpp, utils.cpp under test_fru_utils executable. And fru_device.cpp already has main file. So we can't move to test_fru_utils. So, moved main function straightly to seperate new file(fru_device_main.cpp) file. 

These changes resolves all those issues.
Please let me know if you need more clarifications.
are they needed here? Please don't just copy and paste, make sure everything is required.
Done
duplicated
Done. Removed duplicate.
Done
Done
Why const is removed?
Done
why are these needed here?
Done
Overall, I think refactor needs to be done first to abstract the common functionality.

Zhikui, My Intention is move the functions updateFRUProperty and addFruObjectToDbus from fru_device.cpp to  fru_utils.cpp file as these are the common functions which is used for fru-device and ipmb-fru-device daemons.

I have added below patch to do direct move with lesser code change and without refactoring. But getting test_fru_utils CI failures.
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/entity-manager/+/60892
https://jenkins.openbmc.org/job/ci-repository/61554/console

Could you please explain how you expect to refactor this code ?
Does this call make sense for ipmi_fru? Consider factor it out. See my other comments.
Ack
Ack. Working on it
Please mark is as WIP so it is easier to tell the status

this function wrapper here does not make sense. rescanBusses was designed for fru_device on i2c bus. The question needs to be answered first is: does ipmi_fru need rescanBusses(). If not, then it should not be in this function. If yes, what should it do and how is it different than fru_device.
Ack. Working on it
